Row.Text: Like and Repost

Will try hard to gain [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor. Likes civilizations with high [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor that are competing for a Diplomatic Victory; dislikes civilizations lacking [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor.

Himari Uehara, your life is like an endless feast—constantly exploring for food and constantly enthused about love! For now, indulge in the sweet embrace of sugar; as for the weight loss issue, leave it for tomorrow's self to work miracles with great effort! Everyone loves the clumsy yet active you, and you always excitedly love this world, following uplifting news.
+ {1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture from adjacent Farms.
+ {1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture from adjacent Pastures.
+ {1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture from adjacent Camps.
+{1_iBonus} {2_YieldIcon} from {3_AdjacentSubjectNum} total [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer activations.
Shouting AAO
SNS War
+50% [ICON_Production] Production when building Campuses and Theater Squares.
Cities with Wonders gain +5 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +8 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
Everyone, shout together: A! A! O!
Let's see who is most committed to improving their civilization's science and culture!
Follow Himari's call and shout AAO together!
Yes! I'm going to post a super popular update and go viral!
Let's see who has the most Wonders!
Compete with Himari to see who is the king of social media traffic!
A! A! O! together and achieve the highest score!
Create today's buzz and achieve the highest score!
Gain [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points. Build more Theater Squares.
Gain [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points. Build more Campuses.
Own more Wonders.
Receive one [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist.
Receive 500 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
Receive 250 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
Receive one [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant.
Receive 20 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points.
Receive 10 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points.
+ {1_num} [ICON_Science] Science from adjacent Talismans.
+ {1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture from adjacent Talismans.
+ {1_num} [ICON_Production] Production from adjacent Talismans.
Industrial Zone Adjacency Bonus
Ei, Ei, Oh![NEWLINE](A, A, O!)

The bassist of Afterglow, and the de jure leader of the band. Often takes the lead in pumping up the atmosphere by shouting "Ei! Ei! Oh!" (commonly known as "AAO"), but is often met with silence, earning her the nickname "One Call, Zero Response".

Loves eating chocolate and is always worrying about her increasing weight. She screams when she sees the number on the scale, hence also called "Hima"-ri (a pun on 'fat'). (Moca: Let's transfer all the fat to poor Hi-Chan =w=)

As the most optimistic member of Afterglow, Himari is the coordinator of the five and the most 'girly' member of the group. However, she has a low tear threshold and is defenseless against touching stories—and also defenseless against the peerless coolness of Lady Kaoru Seta.

Himari has gyaru attributes. Although jokes about her figure are prevalent (unlike the often-mentioned Lisa or Touko), she enjoys comparing various sweets bought from convenience stores, is passionate about making desserts by hand, and loves collecting cute things like pretty clothes and plush toys, actively engaging in social networks.

(Compiled from Fandom, Moegirlpedia)[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Did you know: Himari, also a pink-haired character, is honorably listed among the "Maruyama Family", and due to her stature, is nicknamed "Grand Maruyama".
Talismans, often carried on one's person to ward off disaster. They come in various forms, including pendants and bracelets.

As the leader who wished to make a tangible contribution to Afterglow, Himari personally sewed talismans for each of her Afterglow companions. However, her rather rough craftsmanship resulted in products that were not very aesthetically pleasing, once stunning the scene into silence.
You're shining so brightly now... At this rate, you'll surpass me in the blink of an eye! But that means I'll respond with effort too. I'm sure we can maintain a great relationship from now on!
The atmosphere is so good, won't you join in T_T...?
She likes civilizations with high Diplomatic Favor.
She dislikes civilizations not competing for a Diplomatic Victory.
Great, great! Sounds fun! Then we're friends, right~?
No, no, this is too embarrassing!
Getting fired up, right? Let's have fun together—Ei! Ei! Oh!
Great, great! Sounds fun! Then we're friends, right~?
Why is nobody paying attention to me (╥﹏╥)...?
N-No, no! Now is my best chance to fulfill my duty as leader!
Everyone~ Let's do our best for this epic battle—Ei! Ei! Oh!
No, no, I can't cry yet!... Because I'm the leader, the captain of Afterglow...
No, no, I can't cry yet!... Because I'm the leader, the captain of Afterglow...
After all, today is the day your delegation arrives! I've been looking forward to it for a week~!
Sniff... I want to eat cake... But I don't want to gain weight... But, cake... But I don't want to gain weight...

We've brought lots of great things! There's the rarest performance poster of Senior Kaoru in existence, fluffy sweets that you and I will both love, and a talisman I made by hand, inspired by your style!
Um... that doesn't sound like a compliment...
Hmm... I don't get it...
I'm Himari Uehara. I'm involved in various club activities, and also, I'm the bassist in Afterglow~ Yeah, just talking about it fills me with motivation!
Ah, sorry! I kept talking about myself... Sniff, I'll reflect on it...[NEWLINE]You want to hear more while we have the chance...?
Even though I plan to diet, I absolutely can't miss out on your country's famous chocolate! I'll just keep the diet as a 'preparation' for now, hehe...
As long as everyone is together, we can overcome any difficulty, right~? I want to stay together with everyone forever too...
Looking forward to working with you again today~ Yeah, I'm full of energy today too!
Let's both work even harder and not lose to the passion we had back then!
Don't look at me with strange eyes and then walk away~! Please, listen to my explanation~!!
You always act alone...—Isn't that lonely? And besides, war and conflict are the worst!
